nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure if this should be called directly from onEnable(). Static initializers in interfaces aren't possible.
Related: https://github.com/TheMolkaPL/PGM-1/blob/a2cecd355b3894b8d4e22f712716f503d197b428/src/main/java/tc/oc/pgm/maptag/StandardMapTags.java#L41

This method isn't called after I put a space in the parameters. The expected behavior is that this should suggest maptags in each parameter. /maps #tdm #<-- it's not suggesting here
@Electroid Any ideas how I can fix this?
